title: Yogi Bear & Friends
resume: Yogi Bear & Friends is a syndicated animated series by Hanna-Barbera Productions that aired between 1967 and 1968. The show mainly consisted of reruns of classic shorts featuring Yogi Bear, Huckleberry Hound, Hokey Wolf, Pixie and Dixie, Yakky Doodle, and Snagglepuss.
